name: The Perfect Storm
description: Live a pirate's life, and sail through the Perfect Storm. This drink be sure to get ye some sea legs!
ingredients: 1 part Dark Rum (Kraken if ye be a brave soul)
3 parts Ginger Beer (Crabbies be the pirate's favorite)
2 dashes Bitters (if ye be feelin' fancy)
Half Lime (for juice... and to prevent scurvy)
Ice (if ye be wantin' it cool)
directions: Add rum and lime juice into glass
Pour the ginger beer on top, and follow with the bitters
